text: The Opening Night is a 1927 American silent drama film directed by Edward H. Griffith and starring Claire Windsor, John Bowers and E. Alyn Warren.Munden, Kenneth White. The American Film Institute Catalog of Motion Pictures Produced in the United States, Part 1. University of California Press, 1997, page 574 ==Cast== * Claire Windsor as Carol Chandler * John Bowers as Jimmy Keane * E. Alyn Warren as Robert Chandler * Grace Goodall as Gertrude Ames * Bobbie Mack as Aaron Hinkle * William Welsh as Fisherman ==References== ==External links== * Category:1927 films Category:1927 drama films Category:English-language films Category:American films Category:American silent feature films Category:American drama films Category:American black-and-white films Category:Films directed by Edward H. Griffith Category:Columbia Pictures films
title: The Opening Night
